column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/ccd1372dd063e4098a245da91c9e73743484f68a for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
If you don't like `//!`, please use `///` instead (see http://www.stack.nl/~dimitri/doxygen/manual/docblocks.html)\n
I really just tried to use the same comment for this as we use in other source files :).\n
I understand, but // is not enough to make doxygen see it as a function documentation.\n
